panels.description:
Sum of SqlListenerSqlProcTime/Milliseconds.
SqlListenerSqlProcTime is time in milliseconds starting from the point when a request is received from an application client until a response is sent back to the client.
panels.title: Active Time

panels.description:
Sum of SqlListenerIdleTime/Milliseconds.
SqlListenerIdleTime is time in milliseconds that transaction engine is waiting on a request from an application client.
panels.title: Idle Time

panels.description:
Sum of SqlListenerStallTime/Milliseconds.
SqlListenerStallTime is time in milliseconds when request processing was blocked. That includes being blocked by other transactions, objects to load, network waits and locks.This time is included in SqlListnerSqlProcTime.
panels.title: Stall Time

panels.description:
Sum of SqlListenerThrottleTime/Milliseconds.
SqlListenerThrottleTime is time in milliseconds when processing was suspended to let garbage collector to free memory. This time is included in SqlListenerSqlProcTime.
panels.title: Throttle Time

panels.description: Graph of Active, Idle, Stalled, and Throttled time.
panels.title: Connection Timing History

panels.description:
Average of SqlListenerSqlProcTime/Milliseconds, for each NuoDB Node.
SqlListenerSqlProcTime is time in milliseconds starting from the point when a request is received from an application client until a response is sent back to the client.
panels.title: Active Time by Node

panels.description:
Average of SqlListenerStallTime/Milliseconds, for each NuoDB node.
SqlListenerStallTime is time in milliseconds when request processing was blocked. That includes being blocked by other transactions, objects to load, network waits and locks.This time is included in SqlListnerSqlProcTime.
panels.title: Stalled Time by Node

panels.description:
Average of SqlListenerIdleTime/Milliseconds, for each NuoDB Node.
SqlListenerIdleTime is time in milliseconds that transaction engine is waiting on a request from an application client.
panels.title: Idle Time by Node

panels.description:
Average of SqlListenerThrottleTime/Milliseconds, for each NuoDB node.
SqlListenerThrottleTime is time in milliseconds when processing was suspended to let garbage collector to free memory. This time is included in SqlListenerSqlProcTime.
panels.title: Throttled Time by Node
